title: Haribo Gummies | Candy Direct â€“ CandyDirect.com
text: This might be the most famous maker of all things gummy! We're talking about Haribo Candy and we have an entire category dedicated to their deliciousness. Founded in Germany, this company has been shaping delectable gummy treats for decades and is sure to please all the candy lovers in your household. Whether you and your family loves Gummi Bears, gummy shaped berries, red licorice wheels, gummy worms, or a slew of other gummi treats, you'll find them here. Start shopping today and you can bring home bulk supplies of amazing gummi candies that you will love for days and weeks to come.
